name: BIB Token
description: BIB token is the platform pass of BIB Exchange and BIB Meta based on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). BIB Token created a DEX+CEX development path with exclusive traits. BIB holders can earn profits from BIB group's decentralized protocol BIB Meta and centralized crypto trading platform BIB Exchange including but not limited to capital gains of asset appreciation, transaction fee dividends, NFT minting, and other virtual entertainment utilities.
